API.ADK

Class DeviceList

  • java.lang.Object
    • API.ADK.DeviceList

  • public class DeviceList
extends java.lang.Object
    List of all supported devices and its status. This list contains the number of device, name of device, its MAC address, its number of controller, each controller's number of message channel, the detection status of each device. All the indexes start from 0.
    Author:
    hroesdiyono

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      byte[] controllerIndex
      The index of the controller.
      ConnectionStatus[] controllerObjectStatus
      The status of the controller object, either the object has not been created, has been created, or has been connected.
      ControllerStatus[] controllerStatus
      The status of the controller, either the it is started or stopped.
      DetectionMethod[] detectionStatus
      The status of the detection, PAIRED_DEVICE or DETECTED_DEVICE.
      byte[] deviceIndex
      Incremental index of the device.
      java.lang.String[] deviceMACAddress
      The MAC Address of the device.
      java.lang.String[] deviceName
      The Bluetooth name of the device.
      ConnectionStatus[] deviceObjectStatus
      The status of the device object, either the object has not been created, or has been created.
      DeviceType[] deviceType
      The type of the device.
      byte[] listIndex
      Incremental index of the list.
      byte numberOfController
      The total number of detected controller.
      byte numberOfDevice
      The number of detected device.
      byte[] numberOfMessageChannel
      The number of message channel of each controller.
      byte[] receiveFilterType
      The type of receive filter used by each controller, HARDWARE_FILTER or SOFTWARE_FILTER.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeviceList()
      The default constructor of the DeviceList.
      DeviceList(byte size)
      The constructor of the DeviceList.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • listIndex

        public byte[] listIndex
        Incremental index of the list. This index is used externally for creating object of Device, Controller, or Message Channel.

      • deviceIndex

        public byte[] deviceIndex
        Incremental index of the device. There might be more than one row that have the same device index number if the device contains more than one controller. This index is used internally.

      • deviceName

        public java.lang.String[] deviceName
        The Bluetooth name of the device.

      • deviceMACAddress

        public java.lang.String[] deviceMACAddress
        The MAC Address of the device. This address is used to open a connection to the device.

      • deviceType

        public DeviceType[] deviceType
        The type of the device. This device type is used internally to solve compatibility issue between different device types.

      • detectionStatus

        public DetectionMethod[] detectionStatus
        The status of the detection, PAIRED_DEVICE or DETECTED_DEVICE.

      • controllerIndex

        public byte[] controllerIndex
        The index of the controller. Each device has its own controller index. Currently, there is no available device that has more than one controller, so this index is reserved for future use.

      • deviceObjectStatus

        public ConnectionStatus[] deviceObjectStatus
        The status of the device object, either the object has not been created, or has been created.

      • controllerObjectStatus

        public ConnectionStatus[] controllerObjectStatus
        The status of the controller object, either the object has not been created, has been created, or has been connected.

      • controllerStatus

        public ControllerStatus[] controllerStatus
        The status of the controller, either the it is started or stopped. It is filled automatically at the initialization of Controller object.

      • receiveFilterType

        public byte[] receiveFilterType
        The type of receive filter used by each controller, HARDWARE_FILTER or SOFTWARE_FILTER.

      • numberOfMessageChannel

        public byte[] numberOfMessageChannel
        The number of message channel of each controller.

      • numberOfDevice

        public byte numberOfDevice
        The number of detected device.

      • numberOfController

        public byte numberOfController
        The total number of detected controller. Since the number of detected controller is the same as the length of the list, this number is used internally and externally as a reference to the length of the list.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DeviceList

        public DeviceList(byte size)
        The constructor of the DeviceList.
        Parameters:
        size - Input: The size of the list.

      • DeviceList

        public DeviceList()
        The default constructor of the DeviceList.
